pageProduct.name: The Hemp Company Pink Pomelo Soap 120g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Made with natural ingredients, The Hemp Company Soap moisturises, softens, hydrates and nourishes the skin whilst washing away daily environmental pollutants.

Warnings

Avoid Contact with eyes. Not for Internal use.

Common Uses

Cleanse, nourish and soften skin

Ingredients

Sodium Palmate, SodiumCocoate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, 
Aqua (Water), Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Glycerin, 
Sodium Chloride, Butyrospermum parkii (Shea Butter), Tetrasodium EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Yellow C.I 11680, Red C.I 12490, Violet C.I. 60725

Directions

Apply soap to damp skin and gently massage until a luxurious lather forms. Rinse. Use The Hemp Company soap as desired to cleanse.
